attributes.action: Facebook to report animal cruelty videos to the relevant authorities.
attributes.additional_details: There is no proper report option for reporting these sick videos on Facebook and tonight after being distraught about a video I saw (woman throwing puppies out of a bucket into a river to kill them). So I reported as violence and received a reply to say that the video had been reviewed and it wasn't against there community standards !!
attributes.background: Facebook should report all the details of the person that originally posted the video.
